manifest_description.message: A simple popup to undo closed tabs, just that and a bit more.

opt_looks_opt1.message: Show badge with number of closed tabs on toolbar icon

opt_looks_opt7.message: Show page title instead of URL in tooltips

opt_func_opt1_tooltip.message: Affects the result of the search via the search bar in the popup.

opt_func_opt5_tooltip.message: Works only when you use the hotkey on a normal webpage, not a browser settings page, New Tab page or Chrome Web Store page.

opt_func_opt7.message: Save closed tabs on browser close

opt_func_opt8.message: Amount of closed tabs to save :

opt_func_opt9.message: Amount of closed tabs to display per page :

opt_func_opt10.message: Amount of lines of text to display for each tab :

cred_line1.message: Credits to Sexy Undo Close Tab as SimpleUndoClose is a fork of it.

cred_line2.message: Also thanks to Undo Close tab plugin, which Sexy Undo Close Tab came from.

cred_line3.message: Finally also thanks to all other extensions the Undo Close tab plugin may have forked from :)

cred_line4.message: Additional credits to Android Design for the 3 icons located top right.

tips_tip1.message: Hotkey to undo latest closed tab

tips_tip1_line1.message: HOW: Make sure option is checked then hit the hotkey combination

tips_tip1_line2.message: NOTE: Does not work on the browser's internal pages

tips_tip2.message: Double-click on toolbar icon to undo latest closed tab

tips_tip2_line1.message: HOW: Make sure option is not checked then double-click on toolbar icon

tips_tip2_line2.message: NOTE: You might need to time your second click

tips_tip3.message: Keyboard navigation in the extension popup

tips_tip3_line1.message: HOW: Trigger the popup then use arrow keys to navigate

tips_tip3_line2.message: CONTROLS: ←, → = Previous, Next page; ↑, ↓ = Run through the closed tab list; Enter = select link

tips_tip4.message: Assign a keyboard shortcut to the extension

tips_tip4_line1.message: HOW: Go to the the browser's Extensions settings page, scroll to the bottom and click "Keyboard shortcuts"

perm_reason1b.message: WHY: This is to facilitate the content script that enables the Ctrl+Z undo function

perm_reason2b.message: WHY: Required for use of the chrome.tabs API to detect tab status and to get the tab details

perm_text2.message: You can find out more about permission warning triggers here

feed_text1.message: Feel free to leave a message in regards to bugs, questions or suggestions.

other_text1.message: Do drop by my DeviantArt page to see more of my works!
